sentences.sentence: I don't think Linda appreciated my wisecracks.
sentences.translation: 我看琳达好像不怎么喜欢我的俏皮话。

sentences.sentence: Karen: I find these wisecracks increasingly less funny!
sentences.translation: 凯伦：我越来越觉得这种俏皮话一点儿都不好笑！

sentences.sentence: I'll never make wisecracks when you scrape your tires against the curb while parallel parking.
sentences.translation: 如果你并行停车时车胎剐在马路边上，我决不会说风凉话。
